label: Later 18th Century Literature
description: Focused study of texts produced in Great Britain and its empire between roughly 1740 and 1790. Writers may include Laurence Sterne, Mary Leapor, Thomas Warton, and others. 3 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: One year of college literature or consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: One year of college literature or consent of instructor.
